item.description:
Let's climb!

Meet us at the tables at 7 PM. We'll team up by 7:10 PM. If you arrive later, check the dry-erase board where I'll post what I'm wearing.

Please note that you will need to pass a belay test if you are an experienced climber but new to the gym. You can take a belay test when you get there. If you have never climbed before, you should take the class; please call the gym in advance to make arrangements if you need one.

Metrorock will charge you $16 for a daypass if you are not already a member or a punch card holder. Ladies get a 50% discount on Monday nights.

See http://www.metrorock... for directions.
item.name: Metro Monday
